Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Attention all you Finance Buffs! Our boy Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers is making waves with his major economic meetings in the US. During these talks he's gained some much-needed insight on the meaning behind the budget deficit. While Flying home Chalmers now plans on putting the final touches on the upcoming Federal budget but ensuring cost of living releases are fair without being reckless. Additionally he's set to take a closer look at monetary policies of The Reserve Bank with the implementation of an independent review. Our boy Jim's in it to win it delivering meaningful recommendations and setting a benchmark for future budgets.
